titleStmt.title: A good warning for all maidens, by the example of Gods judgment shew'd upon one Jermans [sic] wife of Clifton in the County of Nottingham, who lying in childbed was born away and never heard of after. The tune is, The Ladies fall.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and W. Gilbetson [sic],

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
